name: Creepy Pharmacist: All My Patients are Horrific
author: 一条咸鱼c
content: Will this treacherous darkness swallow you up, or will you survive as a unique existence? Lin En accidentally transmigrated into this monstrous world. As a rare human doctor, every one of his patients was moved by his &quotgentle&quot treatment and &quotsincere&quot service! “Anesthetics? Maybe next time.&quot&quotMy knife is quick, it’ll be over soon~&quotWelcome to Bloodsaw Pharmacy, where we will serve you wholeheartedly.
